Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in two business improvement districts.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in two business improvement districts.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended in two business improvement districts.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
